name: Polysomnogram
title: Polysomnogram
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent Polysomnogram test concepts. These terms may be used when reporting a result associated with Polysomnogram test or may be used to represent the procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an record of brain waves, blood oxygen level, heart rate, breathing, and eye and leg movements during sleep.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Polysomnogram test.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Polysomnogram test.)
